B

balance(Collection<? extends Belt.Sink<? super T>>) - Static method in class io.avery.conveyor.Belts
Returns a fan-out sink that forwards each input element to the first available sink among the given sinks.
balanceMergeSink(int) - Static method in class io.avery.conveyor.Belts
Returns an operator that balances computation of outputs across a limited number of concurrent workers.
balanceMergeSource(int) - Static method in class io.avery.conveyor.Belts
Returns an operator that balances computation of outputs across a limited number of concurrent workers.
batch(Supplier<? extends A>, BiConsumer<? super A, ? super T>, Function<? super A, Optional<Instant>>) - Static method in class io.avery.conveyor.Belts
Returns a segue that accumulates pushed elements into a batch, permitting the batch to be yielded once a deadline expires.
Belt - Class in io.avery.conveyor
Interrelated interfaces for expressing flow-controlled processing pipelines, where Sinks accept elements and Sources yield elements.
Belt.Segue<In,Out> - Interface in io.avery.conveyor
A Sink paired with a Source.
Belt.Sink<In> - Interface in io.avery.conveyor
A Stage that accepts input elements.
Belt.SinkOperator<In,Out> - Interface in io.avery.conveyor
Represents an operation on a downstream Sink that produces an upstream Sink.
Belt.SinkStepSource<In,Out> - Interface in io.avery.conveyor
A Segue where the source is a StepSource.
Belt.SinkToStepOperator<In,Out> - Interface in io.avery.conveyor
Represents an operation on a downstream StepSink that produces an upstream Sink.
Belt.Source<Out> - Interface in io.avery.conveyor
A Stage that yields output elements.
Belt.SourceOperator<In,Out> - Interface in io.avery.conveyor
Represents an operation on an upstream Source that produces a downstream Source.
Belt.SourceToStepOperator<In,Out> - Interface in io.avery.conveyor
Represents an operation on an upstream Source that produces a downstream StepSource.
Belt.Stage - Interface in io.avery.conveyor
Sealed interface over Source, Sink, and Station.
Belt.Station - Interface in io.avery.conveyor
A Stage that represents connected Source and Sink stages.
Belt.StepSegue<In,Out> - Interface in io.avery.conveyor
A Segue where the sink is a StepSink and the source is a StepSource.
Belt.StepSink<In> - Interface in io.avery.conveyor
A Sink that can accept input elements one at a time.
Belt.StepSinkOperator<In,Out> - Interface in io.avery.conveyor
Represents an operation on a downstream StepSink that produces an upstream StepSink.
Belt.StepSinkSource<In,Out> - Interface in io.avery.conveyor
A Segue where the sink is a StepSink.
Belt.StepSource<Out> - Interface in io.avery.conveyor
A Source that can yield output elements one at a time.
Belt.StepSourceOperator<In,Out> - Interface in io.avery.conveyor
Represents an operation on an upstream StepSource that produces a downstream StepSource.
Belt.StepToSinkOperator<In,Out> - Interface in io.avery.conveyor
Represents an operation on a downstream Sink that produces an upstream StepSink.
Belt.StepToSourceOperator<In,Out> - Interface in io.avery.conveyor
Represents an operation on an upstream StepSource that produces a downstream Source.
Belts - Class in io.avery.conveyor
Implementations of various useful Stages, Segues, and Operators.
broadcast(Collection<? extends Belt.StepSink<? super T>>) - Static method in class io.avery.conveyor.Belts
Returns a fan-out sink that forwards each input element to all the given sinks, until any sink cancels.
buffer(int) - Static method in class io.avery.conveyor.Belts
Returns a segue that buffers pushed elements to respond to later pulls.
